scikits.statsmodels.discretemod.Logit.cdf¶

Logit.cdf(X)¶

The logistic cumulative distribution function

Parameters:

X : array-like

X is the linear predictor of the logit model. See notes.
Returns:

1/(1 + exp(-X)) :

Notes

In the logit model,
